channel.description: Recent content in documentary on Gladio Free Europe

item.title: Inside the Internet ft. Pam
item.description: The Internet is what gives us power. It’s an energy field created by all artificial things. It surrounds us. It penetrates us. It binds humanity together.

item.title: Channels of Rage
item.description: We discuss the 2003 Israeli documentary Channels of Rage that follows around a couple of rappers in Tel Aviv and discuss the political situation in which it was filmed in.
